org.springframework.web.socket.adapter

Class JettyWebSocketSessionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.adapter.AbstractWebSocketSesssionAdapter<org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session>
      • org.springframework.web.socket.adapter.JettyWebSocketSessionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableWebSocketSession, WebSocketSession

    public class JettyWebSocketSessionAdapter
extends AbstractWebSocketSesssionAdapter<org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session>
    Adapts a Jetty Session to WebSocketSession.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Phillip Webb, Rossen Stoyanchev
